overview: The story tells that Jabir is a professional assassin who can kill five people at a time. He decides to repent at the hands of his young son, but the gang he works in is trying to get him back to form but refuses and threatens them to inform the police. He also recognizes a cabaret dancer trying to push him away. On crime. So the gang decides to kill him and get rid of him. Jaber decides to revenge those who caused the killing of the son, and succeed in the liquidation of the gang for the last one after another. But is arrested during a visit to the tomb of his son.
title: My Son
